This directory contains Microsofts ASP.Net AJAX library.  

Web site: http://www.asp.net/ajax/

See http://www.asp.net/ajax/ajaxcontroltoolkit/Samples/Default.aspx for a good demonstration.

Also check out thirdpart/zips/AjaxControlToolkit.Binary.NET35.zip/AjaxControlToolkitSampleSite.zip for code to copy.

Downloaded on April 20, 2010
